data.message: I'll be really impressed if someone can find the answer to this one for me. I have two facebook accounts, one business and one personal. I want to install the facebook app and messenger twice, on my iPhone, so I can use both accounts Who can tell me a way to do that?

replies.message: Hi Steve. Business Manager is a tool that lets you manage all of the people, ad accounts, and Pages that you work with in one place. To learn more about Business Manager, please visit our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/1612355968988019 -Hailey
